name: WazirX
description:
Launched in 2018, WazirX is India's largest cryptocurrency exchange with over 7.3 million users and has clocked over $21.8 Billion in trading volume solely in 2021.
WazirX also launched a NFT marketplace in 2021 which is currently South Asia's Most Trusted NFT Marketplace with over 8,000 unique wallets registered.
